## Bcp47.tagSimilarity variable

Common levels of match quality for a single language match.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tagSimilarity: {
    exact: number;
    variant: number;
    region: number;
    macroRegion: number;
    neutralRegion: number;
    preferredAffinity: number;
    affinity: number;
    preferredRegion: number;
    sibling: number;
    undetermined: number;
    none: number;
}
```
